description: Find the n'th star number using the formula 6*n*(n-1) + 1.
output_format: A single integer representing the n'th star number.
prompt:
; Find the n'th star number using the formula 6*n*(n-1) + 1.
; Input format: A single integer n.
; Output format: A single integer representing the n'th star number.

#lang racket
completions:
(define (star-number n)
  (let ((n (sub1 n)))
    (* 6 n n) 1))

; Example usage:
; (star-number 1) => 1
; (star-number 2) => 13
; (star-number 3) => 37
; (star-number 4) => 73
; (star-number 5) => 121
